The Quranic researcher is a high heaven, highly placed because it is in the sky, so the attribution of the high to it is a truth, and it is permissible to be a metaphor and it is a fact of its grades and what is in it and what is in it and what is in it and what is in it and what is in it and what is in it and what is in it There is an added deleted, i.E.High degrees, or its trees, or its trees, and in the sea, high and destiny, and it is not hidden in the use of the high in them.
